snippet.title: This is Dragonary
snippet.description:
Dragonary is the first NFT-Game developed by Coinary LTD. In this game, you can raise and battle with your army of dragons. In Dragonary, competitiveness is all that matters. Being the best is the goal, and beating everyone is the price. If you have a good strategy with your dragons, you could be invincible.

Dragons are the protagonist here, and they can be virtual or NFTs that you could transfer in the Coinary marketplace: hub.coinary.com.

There are 2 ways you can play, with an NFT account, or with a virtual one. If you have an NFT account, you are going to receive Coinary Tokens everyday you make the obsidian. Either way, you will be able to experience the best of Dragonarya and what it has to offer. Completing missions, earning rewards, opening chest and battle against friends are just the top of the iceberg. 

The idea Coinary has with Dragonary is a long-term process. This magical world has a lot to offer that has not been seen yet. This game aims to be the best of its kind and Coinary is non-stop working on it as well as growing the whole ecosystem.
-----------
Remember to follow us in all our Social Media channels!

Coinary Announcements Channel: https://t.me/CoinaryAnn
Twitter: https://twitter.com/dragonarygame?s=21&t=ly8pMKHLNxhjRTKE7K8SEA
Facebook: https://m.facebook.com/DragonaryGame?__nodl&refsrc=deprecated&_rdr
Medium: https://blog.coinary.com/
Dragonary Announcements Channel: https://t.me/DragonaryAnn
Global Telegram chat: https://t.me/dragonaryen
Instagram: https://instagram.com/dragonarygame?igshid=YmMyMTA2M2Y=
